topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a9c9bf6368720eb00009c4#post_55a9c9bf6368720eb00009c4
The thing about danmaku/bullet hell games is that your hitbox tends to be extremely tiny.
Notice how sometimes, a white dot appears roughly centered over the player?
Your hitbox is smaller than that.
And it also helps that the hitboxes for bullets tend to be much smaller than their actual sprite too (although not quite to the same degree as the player).
